answers.answer: Hi,I am afraid I will need some additional information about your Mom's diagnosis to be able to offer any information or suggestions--what exactly did her doctor say was her diagnosis?
i actually got it wrong it was gamma proteins in the blood and the doctor said he didnt want to say cos it was rare or he didnt want to worry her. i thought GP's had to tell you whats wrong?

question: my mum has been told she has WAY to many nutrients in her blood and she has been diagnosed with diabetes ive tried to look it up on the internet but came up with zilch. the dr wont tell her what it is cos its rare or something like that and she's getting worried and she also has really high blood pressure problems
title: nutrients in the blood
